SEARCH
Package com.onlineStoreCom.entity.customer

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
com.onlineStoreCom.entity.setting.subsetting.IdBasedEntity
com.onlineStoreCom.entity.address.AbstractAddress
com.onlineStoreCom.entity.address.AbstractAddressWithCountry
com.onlineStoreCom.entity.customer.Customer
@Entity public class Customer extends AbstractAddressWithCountry
Represents a customer in the e-commerce system.

This class extends AbstractAddressWithCountry to include address information and adds customer-specific fields like email, password, and authentication details. Customers can authenticate through different methods (DATABASE, GOOGLE, FACEBOOK).

    • setFullName

      public void setFullName(String name)
      Sets the customer's first and last name from a full name string. If the name contains a space, the first word is treated as the first name and the rest as the last name.
      Parameters:
      name - the full name to parse
